ygData.subject: Re: S. Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: THere is no better place to get to level 12. I am almost at level 12. I got bound to grobb at level 4. In so ro there is some orks camps that have centuries
ygData.messageBody:
THere is no better place to get to level 12. I am almost at level 12. I got
bound to grobb at level 4. In so ro there is some orks camps that have
centuries far from the group so you can kill then easy and get good ex. They
are the camps just befor the desert. on the east side!!! Also when you get
to level 11. Your pet sucks again. Well troll warriors make wonderfull pets.
Just dont tell them that s what they are. Get impart strenth and dark
empathy and group up at level 9, 10, 11 and kill dervish for good money.
They have bronxe weapons and that worth good plat. Also in guk the froggie
city there is lots of woven armor to be had off the froggies!! So good luck
dark brother!

>Does anybody know if there is good hunting in S. Ro for a lvl 8 Necro
>(whose bound to Grobb)? I will hit lvl 8 in 1.5 bubbles and would like
>to earn some serious cash and exp to get to lvl 12 aaps so I can start
>to visit the world.
>Thanks
>Slortar
>Karana
